title: Creating a reading list of articles on end-to-end syntactic parsing and its importance for semantic role labeling (SRL) and machine translation involves selecting influential and relevant papers from the field. Here is a list of 20 articles up to 2021 that you might find useful

author.particle: End-to-End Neural Network Dependency Parsing" by

title: This paper introduces a neural network-based approach to dependency parsing

author.particle: Deep Biaffine Attention for Neural Dependency Parsing" by

title: This work extends the previous paper with a biaffine attention mechanism

author.particle: Accurate Dependency Parser using Neural Networks" by

title: This paper presents a neural network-based dependency parser that is both fast and accurate
**"Transition-Based Dependency Parsing with Stack Long Short-Term Memory"** by Dyer
This paper introduces a transition-based parser using LSTM networks

author.particle: Constituency Parsing with a Self-Attentive Encoder" by

title: This paper presents a self-attentive encoder for constituency parsing
**"Universal Dependencies: A Cross-Linguistic Perspective"** by
This paper discusses the Universal Dependencies framework, which is important for multilingual parsing
**"Semantic Role Labeling: Past, Present and Future"**
This paper provides a comprehensive overview of SRL
**"End-to-End Learning of Semantic Role Labeling Using Recurrent Neural Networks"** by
This paper explores the use of RNNs for SRL
**"Deep Semantic Role Labeling: What Works and What's Next"** by He
This paper investigates deep learning approaches to SRL
This survey covers various approaches to semantic parsing, including syntactic parsing
This influential paper introduces the attention mechanism in machine translation

author.particle: Attention is All You Need" by

title: This paper introduces the Transformer model, which has become foundational in machine translation

author.literal: **"Syntax-based Statistical Machine Translation"** by Chiang, D.

title: This paper discusses the use of syntactic information in statistical machine translation
**"Improving Neural Machine Translation Models with Syntax-Aware Encoder and Decoder"**
This paper explores incorporating syntactic information into NMT models
**"Syntactic Neural Machine Translation Models with Source-side Syntactic Tree Information"** by
This paper discusses the integration of syntactic trees in NMT
**"A Survey of the State of the Art in Natural Language Generation: Core Tasks, Applications and Evaluation"**
This survey includes discussions on the role of syntax in NLG

author.particle: Dependency Parsing as Head Selection" by

title: This paper presents a novel approach to dependency parsing

container-title: **"Exploring the Role of Syntax in Neural Machine Translation"**
title: This paper investigates the impact of syntactic information on NMT
**"Syntax-aware Neural Semantic Role Labeling with Supertags"** by Strubell
This paper explores the use of syntactic supertags in SRL
**"Jointly Predicting Predicates and Arguments in Neural Semantic Role Labeling"** by He
This paper presents a joint model for SRL that leverages syntactic information
These articles cover a range of topics related to syntactic parsing, SRL, and machine translation, providing a comprehensive overview of the field up to
